name: Half-Life: Chernobyl
description:
Delete or rename CL_DLLS/GameUI.dll to play it.

Deleting the config.cfg file, and if you are getting stuck in the tram at the very beginning, use console (typing ~ or tilde) and typing in noclip, then going out of the console for a second or so, then typing noclip again to unstuck yourself.

This is one of the few mods for which I recommend binding “sv_maxspeed 600,” “noclip,” and “r_fullbright 0[1]” to handy keys in your config file makes things tolerable.
